markdownRemark.html: During today’s seminar, Minh Nguyen gave a talk titled “Maximum Pontryagin Principle, Optimal Control of Dynamic Systems / Reinforcement Learning”. This methodology is being used in shape optimization problems. See the shape optimization project page here.

frontmatter.title: CVC Lab Fall 2021 Seminar Series #4: Maximum Pontryagin Principle, Optimal Control of Dynamic Systems / Reinforcement Learning
